ModuleDescription: This course provides a thorough introduction to machine learning, datamining, and statistical pattern recognition. Topics include: (i) Supervised learning (parametric/non-parametric algorithms, support vector machines, kernels, neural networks). (ii) Unsupervised learning (clustering, dimensionality reduction, recommender systems). (iii) Best practices in machine learning (bias/variance theory; innovation process in machine learning and AI). Extensive programming workshops are included.
